reviews.review_text: Good certification with practical tools, though some modules felt repetitive. The progress tracker was excellent, but tech implementation could use expansion. Worth it if you're new to default, but experienced practitioners might find some sections basic.
The business-building modules were pure gold. Implemented the referral system and saw 63% revenue increase in 90 days. Finally feel like a legitimate professional in the default space.

Skeptical about the price initially, but the client handouts templates alone saved me 20 hours of work. Closed 13 new clients in 6 weeks using the pitch framework from Module 5. Already made back 2x my investment.

The transcript downloads made all the difference. I learn best by discussion, and the course accommodated that perfectly. The downloadable worksheets helped me finally understand motivational interviewing.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The practical focus made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied intake assessment with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 68% in 6 weeks. Worth every penny.

Decent course. The the core training module was fantastic, but the practice building didn't deliver as much value. Wanted more interactive elements. Still learned enough to justify the cost, but room for improvement.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The practical focus made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied progress tracker with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 148% in 90 days. Worth every penny.

Good certification with practical tools, though some modules felt repetitive. The session planner was excellent, but cultural considerations could use expansion. Worth it if you're new to default, but experienced practitioners might find some sections basic.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from general wellness coaching to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The advanced protocols module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 7 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

The instructor support was exceptional. Dr. Mitchell personally answered my question about handling resistance within one business day. The live Q&A sessions helped me troubleshoot real client scenarios. Never felt alone in the learning process.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from general wellness coaching to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The client onboarding module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 7 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from fitness training to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The ethical boundaries module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 3 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

I've taken 8 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on session structure helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 90 days I had built a waitlist. The community support was incredible too.

Skeptical about the price initially, but the client handouts templates alone saved me 40 hours of work. Closed 4 new clients in 2 months using the pitch framework from the assessment section. Already made back 2x my investment.

As someone with a background in social work, I appreciated the academic rigor. The integration of cognitive-behavioral and motivational interviewing approaches was brilliant. This isn't just 'coaching tips' — it's legitimate professional training.
